presets.author: Atikur Rahman
presets.description: Tag easily highways from Bangladesh. Begin to be localizated.

list_entry.short_description: Thin Rollers: rollerblade, skateboard
Thin Wheels: racing bike
Wheels: city bike, wheelchair, scooter
Robust Wheels: trekking bike, car, rickshaw
High Clearance: light duty off-road vehicle
Off-Road: heavy duty off-road vehicle
Specialized off-road: tractor, ATV
No wheeled vehicle

text.text: Max. speed opposed to way direction

label.text: Tags which are implied and do not need to be set are `motor_vehicle=no` and `emergency=destination`.

combo.values: 30 minutes,60 minutes,180 minutes,1 hour,1.5 hours,1 day,3 days,2 weeks,4 months,1.5 years,unlimited,no,load-unload

list_entry.short_description: Plants that are leafless for a certain period during the year.
Plants that are never entirely without green foliage.
Plants that lose their foliage for a very short period, when old leaves fall off and new foliage growth is starting.
Plants that lose most, but not all, of their foliage for a fraction of the year.
Habitat with evergreen and deciduous vegetation.
Plants that are leafless for a certain period during the year.
Plants that are never entirely without green foliage.
Plants that lose their foliage for a very short period, when old leaves fall off and new foliage growth is starting.
Plants that lose most, but not all, of their foliage for a fraction of the year.

text.text: Max. speed opposed to way direction

role.member_expression: natural=peak OR natural=volcano OR mountain_pass=yes OR natural=water OR tourism=viewpoint OR amenity=drinking_water OR natural=spring OR place=locality

check.text: Top rope (approach at the route top + letting the rope down)

combo.values: 24/7|sunset-sunrise open; sunrise-sunset closed|Mar-Jun closed; Jul-Feb Mo-Su,PH sunrise-sunset|Mo-Fr 15:00-22:00; Sa-Su 11:00-22:00

label.text: Highways connecting National capital with Divisional HQs or sea ports or land ports or Asian Highway
Highways connecting National capital with Divisional HQs or sea ports or land ports
Highways connecting District HQs or main river or land ports or with each other not connected by national Highways.
Roads connecting District HQ/s with Upazila HQ/s or connecting one Upazila HQ to another Upazila HQ by a single main connection with National/Regional Highway, through shortest distance/ route.
* Roads connecting Upazila HQ/s with Growth Center/s or one Growth Center with another Growth Center by a single main connection or connecting Growth Center to Higher Road System,
* Through shortest distance/route.(Former Feeder Road Type-B) Roads connecting union HQ/s with Upazila HQs, Growth Centers or local markets or with each other. (Former Rural Road Class-1 (R1)
* Roads connecting Villages with Union HQs, local markets, farms and ghats or with each other. (Former Rural Road Class-2 (R2)
* Roads within a Village. (Former Rural Road Class-3 (R3)

list_entry.short_description: Solid: paved or heavily compacted hardcore surface
Mostly Solid: gravel/rock with some soft material mixed in
Even mixture of hard and soft materials
Mostly Soft: soil/sand/grass with some hard material mixed in
Soft: soil/sand/grass

label.text: Depending on the country, several access tags are implied and do not need to be set.

list_entry.short_description: Trail well cleared. Area flat or slightly sloped, no fall hazard
Trail with continuous line and balanced ascent. Terrain partially steep, fall hazard possible
exposed sites may be secured with ropes or chains, possible need to use hands for balance. Partly exposed sites with fall hazard, scree, pathless jagged rocks

list_entry.display_value: T4 - difficult, exposed, steep alpine trail
list_entry.short_description: sometimes need for hand use to get ahead. Terrain quite exposed, precarious grassy acclivities, jagged rocks, facile snow-free glaciers

list_entry.display_value: T5 - difficult alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: single plainly climbing up to second grade. Exposed, demanding terrain, jagged rocks, few dangerous glacier and snow

list_entry.display_value: T6 - hazardous alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: climbing up to second grade. Often very exposed, precarious jagged rocks, glacier with danger to slip and fall
